info.author: Bryan Farris bryan@goldfishprods.com
info.abstract: The Feature Synthesis< component generates a feature matrix from an entity set and outputs it as a csv file.
info.description: The Feature Synthesis component leverages the Featuretools library to generate a feature matrix from a zipped entity set. The component provides options to specify Agg Primitives, Trans Primitives and Max Depth for the Feature Matrix algorithm. In addition, the component can optionally apply one-hot encoding to the feature matrix output.
info.options:
Agg Primitives - Defaults to Sum,Mean,Percent_True
Trans Primitives - Defaults to Hour
Max depth - Defaults to 3
Encode Output - Defaults to False, enables one-hot encoding of the output
